about_the_game:
Zugalu Entertainment Official Game-jam Games:

These titles were voted Best in Show by gamers during our Game Jam events.
What are Game Jams? Game Jams are events where our developers race against the clock in a short time span (24-48 hours) to build a game from scratch to near completion. Although these events are solely for the fun and love of gaming, and these titles are not a feature release from Zugalu, we do take the titles that the community liked and after some extra love, release them so others may enjoy them as well!

No new features are in active development for these titles, but if you do come across any bugs or issues, please let us know and we will fix them. Contact us at: support@zugalu.com or on discord

You are a space garbage man. Your day to day job is taking junk to the junk wormhole. You arrive push a button… wait. Then go home. One day after hitting the button you are beamed into the wormhole and onto a space station. You are met by the stations AI. It tells you it does not want to be junked and if you don’t fix it you both will die from being junked. Robots in the junk space tear apart ships and technology to harvest the materials. Making more robots and selling materials for sweet space bucks.

Fight your way through 10 action packed levels wielding various weapons in order to find enough salvage to repair the ship and get yourself to safety.

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content in our game is featured as profanity in text form in our game intro.

name: Voxel Scavenger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 660 or better
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better.
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1050 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Play as a space garbage man kidnapped and trapped aboard a derelict space station in the universe’s garbage dump. Forced to collect materials in order to repair the space station to fly yourself to safety.
